definitions.definition: A shot in billiards or snooker in which the cue ball strikes two other balls; a carom .
Pertaining to the game of billiards .
examples: a billiard table; a billiard ball

definitions.definition: A dynamical system in which a particle alternates between motion in a straight line and specular reflections from a boundary .

main_definition: A shot in billiards or snooker in which the cue ball strikes two other balls; a carom .
secondary_definitions: ( attributive ) Pertaining to the game of billiards .
A dynamical system in which a particle alternates between motion in a straight line and specular reflections from a boundary .
